availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Silas Lillard (Beckinridge County, KY, laborer and farmer)

body.p: Breckinridge County, Kentucky, laborer and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Barnett Lillard and Elizabeth Lillard. Laborer in Breckinridge County in 1860. Farmer in Stephensport, Kentucky, in September 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Cloverport, p. 549.
Twelfth Manuscript Census of the United States (1900), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breckinridge County, Cloverport, Enumeration District: 0005, p. 8.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Kentucky, 2nd Congressional District, Vol. 2 of 4, Breckinridge County, September 1863, p. 351, (Accessed via ancestry.com on February 18, 2020).
KYR-0001-020-1511.
